category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 17 (Contract with Chairman, etc.)
contents: Article 17 (Contract with the Chairman, etc.) ① In relation to the appointment of the Chairman in accordance with the provisions of Article 11, Paragraph 1, the Board of Directors prepares a contract containing specific management goals to be achieved by the Chairman during his term and matters related to performance bonuses, etc. and recommends executives. The committee must be notified. In this case, the chairman cannot participate in the board of directors meeting that decides on the contract., ② The executive recommendation committee discusses the contract details and conditions with the person who wishes to recommend as a candidate for chairman of the contract regarding the contract notified in accordance with the provisions of paragraph 1 and reports the results to the Health and Welfare Committee. The Deputy Minister must be notified. In this case, the Executive Recommendation Committee may change some of the contents or conditions of the contract if necessary for consultation with the chairman candidate. ③ The Minister of Health and Welfare may enter into a contract with the person appointed as chairman according to the contract negotiated pursuant to the provisions of paragraph 2. conclude. In this case, the Minister of Health and Welfare may determine the contents or conditions of the contract differently from the contract draft pursuant to the provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2 after consultation with the person appointed as the chairman of the board., ④ The chairman of the board may enter into a performance contract with the executive director and The performance of the performance can be evaluated, and if the performance is poor as a result of the evaluation of the performance, the employee can be dismissed. Revised 2022. 1. 5.
